>> é‚£æˆ‘ç°åœ¨ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªç»å…¸çš„æ¨¡å‹å§ã€‚
>> products (product_id, product_name, category)

>> éœ€è¦çš„åˆ°æ¯ä¸€ä¸ª category çš„æœ€ç•…é”€çš„ 5 ä»¶å•†å“ã€‚
<< okã€‚

WITH pro_with_rank (
    SELECT
        category,
        product_id,
        row_number() over (pritition by category ORDER BY SUM(amount) GROUP BY category) as rank_
    FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id
    GROUP BY product_id, category
)
SELECT
    category,
    product_id,
FROM pro_with_rank
WHERE
    rank_ <= 5
